name: Ultraleicht
description:
You are humanity's last hope of survival, as a Hyper Drive pilot you need to protect the Convoy with earth's remaining civilians to a rocket so they can leave the earth to save the Human Race.

Features 

  • Choose from 3 different convoys to defend
  • Choose from 3 different plane body's to use
  • Reach the safe zone to restore your convoys health
  • As your score increase so does the difficulty 

By:

Aaron Cooper

Andrew Hickin

Jordan Thornton
